heading.title: Train Brain Game
heading.subtitle: Sharpen your math skills with daily problems in Train Brain Game

mathDrill.title: Math Drill
mathDrill.description: Test your math skills with timed problems
mathDrill.detailedDescription: Solve a series of addition, subtraction, and multiplication problems as quickly as you can.

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.detailedDescription: Track your progress with detailed charts and see how your math skills improve.

settings.title: Settings
settings.detailedDescription: Configure the number of problems and other preferences for your math drills.

weeklyTests.title: Weekly Tests
weeklyTests.detailedDescription: Take weekly tests to track your long-term progress and identify areas for improvement.

weeklyTestAvailable.title: Weekly test available!
weeklyTestAvailable.subtitle: You've completed {count, plural, one {# drill} other {# drills}}! Take your weekly test to track your progress.

dailyDrillPending.title: Daily Drill Pending
dailyDrillPending.subtitle: You haven't completed your math drill for today yet.

dailyDrillCompleted.title: Daily Drill Completed!
dailyDrillCompleted.subtitle: Great job! You've completed your daily drill. Come back tomorrow for a new challenge!
